Uses of Package
drcl.inet.socket

Packages that use drcl.inet.socket
drcl.inet.socket   
 

Classes in drcl.inet.socket used by drcl.inet.socket
InetSocket
          This class implements a "socket" equivalent API for application components in the INET framework.
JSimSocketImpl
          In the framework of running real applications on JSim, this class provides a special socket implementation to intercept all the standard Java socket API calls.
Launcher
          This class is the front end of running real applications on JSim/INET.
NonblockingSocketHandler
          Interface defining callbacks for nonblocking socket calls.
SocketConstants
          A collection of constants related to SocketContract.
SocketContract.Message
           
SocketStates
          Defines states of a socket.
